Name: maximize_total_story_points

Description: Minimize the total estimated effort across all tasks

Description: Minimize the summed severity of all blockers

Description: Maximize the number of sprints achieving their goal

Description: Maximize average team satisfaction reported in retrospectives

Description: Minimize total project budget usage across projects

Description: Maximize the recorded maximum velocity for teams

Name: minimize_feature_estimated_effort
Description: Minimize estimated effort per feature to favor smaller increments

Name: maximize_skill_level
Description: Maximize the average skill level across skills cataloged
